examples: You think I did it deliberately, but I assure you (that) I did not.
Crees que lo hice deliberadamente, pero te aseguro (que) no lo hice.
Let me assure you that I will try to help you.
We were assured that everything possible was being done.
Se nos aseguró que se estaba haciendo todo lo posible.
She's perfectly safe, I can assure you.
Ella está perfectamente a salvo, te lo puedo asegurar.
